name: DAYDREAM (itch) (DAYDREAM STUDIO)
description:
A child stuck in a dream loop after her family shatters must relive their memories to reach the nightmare's ending.

Created for Ludum Dare 48, full version coming soon!

Features:

  • Original artwork
  • Complete emotional story, with choices 
  • 2 endings
  • 5 levels
  • A very cute Kiddo

Special thanks to David Fesliyan, as we used his marvelous music for some segments.

This is a passion project. Thank you very much for playing, please feel free to contact us!
